content.raw:
Caching callbacks makes sense. We should maybe create the list of callbacks at plugin initialization in `__main__.py` and then send it to queue manager?

I though analysis\_filter was descriptive as it filters files from analysis. Would `block_analysis_submission` be better? Changing the local variable to `send_to_analysis` with inverted behavior makes sense will change that.
content.html:
Caching callbacks makes sense. We should maybe create the list of callbacks at plugin initialization in __main__.py and then send it to queue manager?

I though analysis_filter was descriptive as it filters files from analysis. Would block_analysis_submission be better? Changing the local variable to send_to_analysis with inverted behavior makes sense will change that.
